00003 extern "C" {
00004 #include <pcap.h>

00007 #include <assert.h>
00008 #include <string.h>

00010 #include "raw_ethernet_packet.h"
00011 
00012 #include "debug.h"

00014 #define HOSTNAMELEN 1024
00015 #define PROGLEN 1024
00016 
00017 /*
00018    reader device ipaddr
00019 
00020    print stream of raw packets bound for this machine to stdout in the
00021    format:  packetsize packetcontents 
00022 */
00023 
00024 
00025 void usage() {
00026     fprintf(stderr, "usage: promisc device host\n");
00027 }
00028           
00029 void PacketHandler(u_char * junk,  const struct pcap_pkthdr * header,  const u_char * packet) {
00030     static int n = 0;
00031 
00032     assert(header->caplen == header->len);
00033   
00034     RawEthernetPacket p((char *)packet, (unsigned)(header->len));
00035     
00036     p.Serialize(1);
00037     
00038     DEBUGPRINTF(5, "wrote packet %d\n",n++);
00039     
00040     kill(getppid(), ETHERNET_SIGNAL);
00041     
00042     DEBUGPRINTF(5, "reader: sent ETHERNET_SIGNAL to parent\n");
00043 
00044 }
00045   
00046 
00047 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00048     char * dev = NULL;
00049     char * host = NULL;
00050 
00051     char prog[PROGLEN];
00052     char ebuf[PCAP_ERRBUF_SIZE];
00053     pcap_t * pcap = NULL;
00054     bpf_u_int32 net;
00055     bpf_u_int32 mask;
00056     struct bpf_program filter;
00057     int count = 0;
00058 
00059     char * ip = getenv("MINET_IPADDR");  
00060 
00061     if (argc != 3) { 
00062         usage();
00063         return -1;
00064     }
00065 
00066     if (ip == 0) { 
00067         fprintf(stderr, "SET MINET_IPADDR");
00068         return -1;
00069     }
00070 
00071     dev = argv[1];
00072     host = argv[2];
00073 
00074     DEBUGPRINTF(10,"Using device %s\n",dev);
00075 
00076     if (pcap_lookupnet(dev, &net, &mask, ebuf)) {
00077         fprintf(stderr, "Can't get net and mask for %s: %s\n", dev, ebuf);
00078         return -1;
00079     }
00080 
00081     DEBUGPRINTF(10,"Net=%x, mask=%x\n",net,mask);
00082   
00083     if ((pcap = pcap_open_live(dev, 1518, 1, 0, ebuf)) == NULL) { 
00084         fprintf(stderr, "Can't open %s: %s\n", dev, ebuf);
00085         return -1;
00086     }
00087 
00088     prog[0] = 0;
00089     //strcpy(prog,"net 10.10/16");
00090 
00091 
00092     sprintf(prog, "host %s or broadcast",ip);
00093   
00094     DEBUGPRINTF(10, "Filter: '%s'\n", prog);
00095 
00096     if (pcap_compile(pcap, &filter, prog, 0, mask)) {
00097         fprintf(stderr, "Can't compile filter\n");
00098         return -1;
00099     }
00100     
00101     if (pcap_setfilter(pcap, &filter)) { 
00102         fprintf(stderr, "Can't set filter\n");
00103         return -1;
00104     }
00105     
00106     DEBUGPRINTF(10, "Starting...\n");
00107     
00108     while (1) { 
00109         count += pcap_loop(pcap, -1, &PacketHandler, 0);
00110         fprintf(stderr, "Error in pcap_loop\n");
00111     }
00112     
00113     DEBUGPRINTF(10, "Handled %d packets\n", count);
00114     
00115     return 0;
00116 
00117 }
